author: hengne
body:
relval scripts update after 760pre7 validation
1.) update mixing/premixing inputs
2.) fix extended generator job splitting issue
3.) add '_' in front of '25ns' and '50ns', such as "HLTDR225ns" to "HLTDR2_25ns",  to have the separation better visible. As suggested by David @davidlange6
title: relval scripts update after 760pre7 validation
